Summon Commander:#710 Carrion Lord
The Panic Apostate gives unholy life and powers to the carcass of a rotting Pan. The Carrion Lord is a powerful wielder of Nature magic, but is also given unholy powers over the dead. The Carrion Lord can create Manikins by animating vines, roots and the bones of dead beasts.
